headline: Con Ed: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The New York-based company said it had net income of $1.69 per share. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring gains, were $1.68 per share. The results exceeded Wall Street expectations.

headline: CON EDISON REPORTS 2024 THIRD QUARTER EARNINGS
summary: Consolidated Edison, Inc. (Con Edison) (NYSE: ED) today reported 2024 third quarter net income for common stock of $588 million or $1.70 a share compared with $526 million or $1.53 a share in the 2023 third quarter. Adjusted earnings (non-GAAP) were $583 million or $1.68 a share in the 2024 period compared with $561 million or $1.62 a share in the 2023 period.
